result.text:
On🇸🇦#SaudiArabia's leading media Asharq News, I shared my analysis about how has intensive high-level mutual visits shaped🇨🇳🇺🇸China-U.S. relations, right ahead of #APEC?
My key points⬇️
▪️Mutual visits and talks could help to reduce the risk of misunderstanding and miscalculation.
▪️Senior officials from both sides have meet and talked not only in Beijing and Washington, but also🇲🇹#Malta.
▪️A large U.S. business delegation is right in Shanghai, attending the China International Import Expo #CIIE.
▪️U.S. shouldn't provoke China's sovereignty and territorial integrity on Taiwan, and shouldn't send a wrong signal to Taiwan separatists.

legacy.description: Journalist & Political-Economic Analyst, Commentator. China-Africa, N/S Korea Fellow. Years in Africa & Middle East for business. Love Travelling. Personal view
legacy.name: Shen Shiwei 沈诗伟

result.text:
Some of President Xi Jinping's key quotes from meeting with Joe Biden at Filoli Estate in #SanFrancisco.
Those would help us to know more about China's perspective. 
➡️For China and U.S., turning their back on each other is not an option. It's unrealistic for one side to remodel the other.
➡️China doesn't have a plan to surpass or unseat the U.S. Like wise, the U.S. should not scheme to suppress and contain China.
➡️Major-country competition is not the prevailing trend of current times and cannot solve the problems facing China and the U.S., or the world at large.

result.text:
🇨🇳🇺🇸 Chinese President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden had their meeting at Filoli Estate in San Francisco.
▪️Xi tells Biden: China, U.S. should assume a new vision and build together Five pillars for China-U.S. relations.
What are the key points?
1⃣Jointly developing a right perception.
2⃣Jointly managing disagreements effectively.
🚨It is important that they appreciate each other’s principles and red lines, and refrain from flip-flopping, being provocative, and crossing the lines.
3⃣Jointly advancing mutually beneficial cooperation.
4⃣Jointly shouldering responsibilities as major countries.
5⃣Jointly promoting people-to-people exchanges.

legacy.full_text: 👍 #California Governor @GavinNewsom promised to get President Xi a #GoldenStateWarriors jersey when they met in Beijing last month — and here it is.⬇️ https://t.co/ous7ULCUJj
